titleStmt.title: A treatise of consumption, and the venereal disease the signs or symptoms of the venereal infection; with the various methods of cure. By T. Nedham, surgeon.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold at his house , the Surgeon's sign, in Martlet-Court, in Bow-street, in Convent-Garden; and Eliz. Harris, at the Harrow, in Little-Britain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
